name: Explorer Crossed Out Thief (PGMV Remix Jam)
name_original: Explorer Crossed Out Thief (PGMV Remix Jam)
description:
Not much to say about this project.

I remixed a few assets such as

  •  Character graphics recolored
  • Music
  • Sound FX

tileset and overall gameplay and theming were made by me.

Guard sprite was made in the style of the player graphic.

I uploaded it by request, and hope you all can enjoy what I managed to finish.

I may work further on this concept, and wish I had more time to work further the jam in general. However, that was not the case, and this very short game is what I managed to finish. That said, I hope you enjoy what I did manage to finish!

Thank you!
